page.title: 02History Interest Maresfield.
page.content: {THE ROMAN ROAD.by Ben &Jonathan The Roman road ran to the west of the B2026 and parallel to it.It goes through maresfield park,under Queens Drive,Maresfield Leisure Centre and south west of the sewage works at Park Wood. {THE DIG.} Near flitterbanks west of the Roman road is an Archeological Dig there is a cave near by in Cave Wood. The cave is artificially cut into sandstone in the side of a small hill. A 20 foot passage lead to a 10 foot diameter circular chamber then a rectanglar chamber 12 foot by 6 foot and another passage 10 foot long 3 foot wide goes off at right angles to it. {POND BAYS.} There are three Pond Bays in our area. These are streams we dammed up for the Iron Industry near Forge&Furnace Wood.
